entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:55 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the evening. Fog patches developing in the evening. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then southeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
